Text:
Dear bigbluesea, You have great uploads! 

I'm interested in researching books (Springer, Palgrave Macmillan, Wiley) on foreign direct investments and investments in general It is very vital for my PhD thesis. Please upload if you have something on it. Many thanks in advance! Do ypu have access to Springer, Palgrave Macmillan, Wiley publications? Could you please upload something on economics and business from these publishers? Many thanks!
Thank you bigbluesea! Nice upload! Do you have other books on economics, business and investments from Springer, Palgrave Macmillan or Wiley? Please upload! It is very vital for me!

Thank you Sir for your great uploads.

I would like to request you if you have any stuff on Production and Operations Management

thanks in advance.
Once again, Thank You, SIR. Another great upload and a qualified inclusion to your superlative torrent collection.
I was wondering if you could possibly upload the updated version of this book?  The 9th edition?  Appreciate it.

Thanks so much bigbluesea, Im in need of the 9th edition but I can hold off on buying from the bookstore and its ridiculous prices and order it online. If you come accross the 9th or 10th edition that would be great! Thanks again
